timeline.bodyText:
I don't think there's any point doing the window.console check here.
According to ...
https://caniuse.com/#feat=console-basic
... IE10 and upwards work whether the dev tools are open or not. Maybe you don't need the window.console test any longer?
timeline.author: adrianfish

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I could just remove it, I think I left it in there as I wanted to make sure it was actually loading and forgot to clean it up. Though having these statements in at debug can be helpful.
replies.author: jonespm

timeline.message: SAK-42928 - 20x, 21x Uncaught TypeError: portal.i18n.loadProperties is not a function
